songs.title: So fine
songs.lyrics:
Cause you're fine so fine
And I know you'll be mine
Woah oh oh, Woah oh oh

Cause you're fine so fine
And I know you'll be mine
Woah oh oh‚ Woah oh oh

Show my feelings
I try to figure it out
I don't know what's going on
What's going on

I feel the world is spinning
So fast I can't hold on
Should I go say hello?
Should I go say hello?

You can see me move‚ I know
Something is going on
Now I'm walking down to you
I ain't got nothing to lose

You can see me move‚ I know
Something is going on
Now I'm walking down to you
I ain't got nothing to lose

Cause you're fine, so fine
I know
You'll be mine
Woah oh oh, woah oh oh

Cause you're fine‚ so fine
I know
You'll be mine
Woah oh oh, woah oh oh

I feel the vibe you're givin'
Somehow I can't hold back
Don't know what's going on
What's going on?
I see in her eyes she's willing
And knows it turns me on
Should I go say hello?
Should I go say hello?

You can see me move, I know
Something is going on
Now I'm walking down to you
I ain't got nothing to lose

You can see me move‚ I know
Something is going on
Now I'm walking down to you
I ain't got nothing to lose

Cause you're fine, so fine
I know
You'll be mine
Woah oh oh, woah oh oh

Cause you're fine, so fine
I know
You'll be mine
Woah oh oh, woah oh oh

(Woah oh oh)
(Woah oh oh)
(Woah oh oh)
(Woah oh oh)
(Woah oh oh)
(Woah oh oh)
(Woah oh oh)
(Woah oh oh)

Feel me shaking
Feel my bones
I've been waiting all night long
All of my scare slows your eyes
Baby just let go, baby just let go

Cause you're fine, so fine
I know
You'll be mine
Woah oh oh, woah oh oh

Cause you're fine, so fine
I know
You'll be mine
Woah oh oh, woah oh oh

Cause you're fine, so fine
I know
You'll be mine
Woah oh oh, woah oh oh

Cause you're fine, so fine
I know
You'll be mine
Woah oh oh, woah oh oh
